text: Michael Kok (born 19 September 1991) is a Dutch retired basketball player. He formerly played for Rotterdam Basketbal 2 before joining the first team of the club in 2012. In 2015, Kok was selected for the U24 DBL All-Star Game. He retired in April 2020 after the 2019–20 season was ended early due to the COVID-19 pandemic. ==References== ==External links== * Michael Kok on RealGM Category:1991 births Category:Living people Category:Dutch men's basketball players Category:Feyenoord Basketball players Category:Dutch Basketball League players Category:Shooting guards
title: Michael Kok
